lines.text: I can't check to see if the <c=#0000FF>Stop Wizard's</c> tattoos are right, since he's a statue...
I mean, if the tattoos were off somehow, and they weren't even Level 1 in the first place, that'd rule out going up to 2.
But... we can't check, and we already checked the <c=#FF0000>Go Wizard,</c> so that's a dead end.
But... we can't check, for this guy.
How about the other one? You check on him, yet?
You check the Go Wizard's tattoos.
You're w-wasting your time. There's- it's fine.
These wizards were definitely level 2. You- you put in a lot of effort to figure that out, right?
S-so- you shouldn't throw all that away on a- a hunch.
